en.manual:
ğŸ“š Welcome to our Telegram bot for automated trading on the IQ Option platform! 

Here's a quick guide on how to get started:

Subscription
To begin using the bot, you need to subscribe first. You can choose between an annual or monthly subscription plan. Alternatively, you can use a 3-day redeem code, which you can only use once.
Additionally, if you invite a friend who makes a deposit, you'll receive a bonus of 3 extra days added to your subscription.
IQ Option Account Registration
Before you can start auto-trading, you need to register your IQ Option trading account with the bot. This allows the bot to execute trades on your behalf.
Trading Settings
Once your account is set up, you can customize your trading preferences:
Set your trading amount as a fixed value or a percentage of your account balance
Choose your preferred trading strategy, such as Martingale
Select the trading pairs you want the bot to focus on
Advanced Features
The bot offers several advanced features to optimize your trading experience:
Real-time market analysis and trend detection
Automatic trade execution on IQ Option based on the bot's signals
Dynamic lot size management with customizable volume multiplication
Automatic selection of the most profitable currency pairs

If you need further assistance or have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact our support team using the "Contact Support" button. We're here to help you achieve your trading goals!

Happy trading! ğŸš€ğŸ“ˆ
